articles.description: Find out who impressed for Manchester City in Wednesday’s Champions League win.
articles.content:
Manchester City made it three wins from three in this seasons Champions League as they beat Copenhagen 5-0 on Wednesday night.
Erling Haaland inevitably netted the first two on the night and was rep… [+2140 chars]
